Comments_List: History of Hollywood and the studio systems.
I learnt the history of film and Hollywood and gained insightful knwoledge about the major studios in Hollywood as well as independent filmmakers.

As I am interested in pursuing a career in film production and business in Hollywood, this course was hugely beneficial for me both to understand the history of the industry as well as how to navigate the ins and outs of it today. I was able to develop both my analytical skills on the film industry as well as my public speaking skills in our final project.
It was interesting and it would be even better to have more on marketing.
The course was organized clearly, which is beneficial for me to understand the logic and relationships between the content in different lectures.
This course is hugely beneficial for any student with an interest in the Hollywood film industry and also provides a great opportunity to practice analytical and writing skills.
Yes, I would. I think I've learned a lot about film in this course. I feel the teaching was very good.

I would. This course helps students to understand different aspects in the film industry, including the history, the modern filmmaking process, and typical films of different studios. Students can also learn to analyze the box office of films. I highly recommend this course to students who are interested in moives and business.
Yes, I would. I believe the professor gave thoughtful feedback throughout the course and was highly knowledgable on the subject.
